name: ALTactics
description:
Blow up the enemy commander and win the game!

Obviously this game isn't close to done, but apart from the placeholder story, art, sfx, and (most) of the music, the gameplay itself is pretty much complete, so I wanted to see how people reacted to it. Any feedback, even if it's just a 'the game crashed, please refund', is much appreciated.

Sienne and Mogami's themes are taken from King Crayfish at https://soundcloud.com/kingcrayfish, he's pretty awesome. The rest of the themes are placeholders.

(Also, please note there are no extras, and clicking extras currently just closes the game.)
